value.description: Value of the deal in a currency specified in the currency field.

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update on the deal in UTC (ISO8601 format).

unqualified_reason_id.description: Reason why the deal was unqualified.

tags.description: An array of tags for a deal.

stage_id.description: Unique identifier of the deal's current stage in the pipeline.

owner_id.description: Unique identifier of the user that the deal is assigned to.

loss_reason_id.description: Reason why the deal was lost.

last_stage_change_by_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who moved the deal into the current stage.

last_stage_change_at.description: Date and time when the deal was moved into the current stage in UTC (ISO8601 format).

last_activity_at.description: Date and time of the last activity on the deal in UTC (ISO8601 format).

hot.description: Indicator of whether or not the deal is hot.

estimated_close_date.description: Estimated close date of the deal.

dropbox_email.description: Dropbox email connected with the deal.

customized_win_likelihood.description: User-provided win likelihood with value range 0-100.

currency.description: Currency of the deal, specified in 3-character currency code (ISO4217) format.

creator_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the deal.

created_at.description: Date and time that the deal was created in UTC (ISO8601 format).

contact_id.description: Unique identifier of a primary contact.

added_at.description: Date and time that the deal was started in UTC (ISO8601 format).
